## Learning Objectives

- Understand the GitHub structure for managing team and project 
- Create, manage, and effectively use GitHub Issues to plan, assign, and monitor tasks.
- Set up and customize GitHub Projects to visualize workflows, prioritize tasks, and streamline team coordination.
